channel.title: How can I add all the quests into EasyRSC?
channel.description: Can someone send me original quest files/codes and show me how I can add them or edit them in? I'm new to this and I would really love some help.

item.title: How can I add all the quests into EasyRSC?
item.dc:creator: @Anton Anton
item.description:
@Anton wrote:

search for something like “romeojuliet” or “RomeoJuliet” in your source folder, this will show every place you need to add some code and you can just copy paste the other quests and change the variables etc

Then you need to set up the NPChandlers.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I add all the quests into EasyRSC?
